I like those classic shirts, but that is far from enough for getting the Ultimate edition. I'll just get the regular game.

That said, Tekken 8 itself looks like it will be a classic. The game looks truely epic. Shame the Ultimate/preorder goodies don't measure up. What would I do to make the preorder/Ultimate edition worth it? Give each character a bespoke gala outfit, or classic game outfits, maybe classic Japanese style outfits.
